ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 12 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: True. The spell designer said that mobs are stronger than their level when you consider them at higher levels. And you can see that it is very risky to fight a
ygData.messageBody:
True. The spell designer said that mobs are stronger than their level when
you consider them at higher levels. And you can see that it is very risky to
fight a black mob alone. It is supposed to be the same with our pet. So a
green one is a normal one, and a blue one is very strong.
He added "Don't worry too much about that". Well, I'll try...

Taldir, Teir'Dal on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: TkAdam@... [mailto:TkAdam@...]
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:13 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 12 Pet


From: TkAdam@...

It is not a bug...

It is intentional

From level 12 and up... the pets range fromn 4 levels bellow you to the
spell
level...

so that is 8 to 12, the next is 12 to 16 (the spell I currently have) etc.

Supposedly a game balance thing :(

Sonoroud
